WKY Developers

Developers and engineers from Western Kentucky meeting to share and discuss ideas around software development

First Event

20 Aug 2014

We are happy to announce that we are going to be having our first meeting for the Western Kentucky Developers User Group on September 8, 2014 at 6pm in room 551 in the Business Building on Murray State's campus. You can find out more about this meeting on the meetings page.

To find out more about this group, please read the about page. To stay in touch, follow us on Twitter @wkydev or subscribe to the Atom feed. We will also have a news letter you can subscribe to soon.
